abstract: In a filing in Manhattan bankruptcy court, Berkshire essentially offered to step in as the preliminary bidder for both the mortgage origination and servicing business and a portfolio of loans that are both being put up for auction.
snippet: In a filing in Manhattan bankruptcy court, Berkshire essentially offered to step in as the preliminary bidder for both the mortgage origination and servicing business and a portfolio of loans that are both being put up for auction.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway offered on Monday to buy most of Residential Capital, the bankrupt mortgage unit of Ally Financial, trying again to acquire the business.

headline.main: Berkshire Offers to Buy ResCap Assets

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
